name: Number 7
description:
Number 7 is a free, fun, and addictive new brain puzzle free download game. As a classic game Lines is popular at all over the world but this game have a new great features so it is even better! Both adult and kids can enjoy the game Number 7. Play it with your family and train your brain.

Features
- Dynamic gameplay (this game isn’t boring!!)
- Special functions to destroy the blocks
- Easy to learn
- Hard to master
- High score
- Auto save function (to protect your progress)
- New and interesting way of playing classic game
- Nice music
- Good sound effects
- Beautiful and simple UI
- Play anywhere on both mobile and tablet
- Free download game (no In-App purchase)

Enjoy it with your family and friends.
